description: Enable AI assistants to search and retrieve detailed book and author information from the Open Library. Provide structured, consistent JSON responses for book titles, author details, and cover images. Enhance AI capabilities with comprehensive book and author data access via a standardized protocol.

tools.name: get_book_by_title
tools.description: Search for a book by its title on Open Library.

title.description: The title of the book to search for.

tools.name: get_authors_by_name
tools.description: Search for author information on Open Library.

name.description: The name of the author to search for.

tools.name: get_author_info
tools.description: Get detailed information for a specific author using their Open Library Author Key (e.g. OL23919A).

author_key.description: The Open Library key for the author (e.g., OL23919A).

tools.name: get_author_photo
tools.description: Get the URL for an author's photo using their Open Library Author ID (OLID e.g. OL23919A).

olid.description: The Open Library Author ID (OLID) for the author (e.g. OL23919A).

tools.name: get_book_cover
tools.description: Get the URL for a book's cover image using a key (ISBN, OCLC, LCCN, OLID, ID) and value.

key.description: The type of identifier used (ISBN, OCLC, LCCN, OLID, ID).

size.description: The desired size of the cover (S, M, or L).

tools.name: get_book_by_id
tools.description: Get detailed information about a book using its identifier (ISBN, LCCN, OCLC, OLID).

idType.description: The type of identifier used (ISBN, LCCN, OCLC, OLID).
